item.title: PyNUFFT: experiences & reflections on high-performance biomed imaging reconstruct
item.description:
Description

The Python non-uniform fast Fourier transform (PyNUFFT) provides a high-speed, yet accurate non-Cartesian data processing method to many research fields, including magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) and tomography.
item.dc:creator: Jyh-Miin Lin
